code: @Test public void bannerAndLoggingIsOutputByDefault() throws Exception {     String output = this.cli.run("quiet.groovy").     assertThat(output).contains(" :: Spring Boot ::").     assertThat(output).contains("Starting application").     assertThat(output).contains("Ssshh"). }

@Test public void quietModeSuppressesAllCliOutput() throws Exception {     this.cli.run("quiet.groovy").     String output = this.cli.run("quiet.groovy", "-q").     assertThat(output).isEqualTo("Ssshh"). }
